rooms.name: Main Entrance and Lobby
rooms.description: A welcoming lobby with wheelchair-accessible pathways; includes a reception area for guests.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living room designed with Vastu principles in mind, featuring open space and natural light; wheelchair accessible.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen, large dining area for joint family gatherings; ensures smooth circulation.

rooms.name: Family Kitchen
rooms.description: Fully equipped modern kitchen with an island counter and wheelchair-accessible layout. Adheres to Vastu guidelines by keeping the main entrance in the east direction.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A dedicated private gym area fitted with modern workout equipment and wheelchair-accessible installations. Ventilation provided for indoor air quality.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Dedicated guest room with en-suite bathroom for visiting family members; designed to be accessible with wider doorways and no-step entry.

rooms.name: Service Area
rooms.description: Includes laundry, storage, and utility spaces. Maintains Vastu principles by being placed in the rear or west side of the plot.

openings.description: Large accessible door with a ramp for wheelchair users; positioned on the east to align with Vastu.
Multiple windows across living areas and bedrooms ensure adequate natural light as per Vastu guidelines, ensuring east-west orientation.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an ensuite bathroom. Designed for privacy and comfort, with Vastu-aligned east window.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional master bedroom designed to accommodate joint family members; includes an ensuite and wheelchair accessible facilities.

rooms.name: Bedroom for Joint Family Members
rooms.description: Multiple adjoining rooms offering flexibility for other family members; each room is designed with accessibility in mind.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated home theater area with state-of-the-art audiovisual equipment and comfortable seating arrangements; designed for wheelchair access and soundproofing.

openings.description: Wheelchair-accessible staircase with railings and alternate ramp available. Positioned centrally for easy access between floors.
Balconies on select rooms provide natural ventilation, aligning with Vastu principles regarding the flow of energy.

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Extra bedroom designed for joint family members, ensuring adequate space and accessibility features; includes a small study area.

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Another additional bedroom ensuring flexible use and privacy for extended family members.

openings.description: Secondary staircase connecting upper floor to other levels with safety railings and ramp alternatives. Placed in compliance with Vastu guidelines.
